name: Unseen Ambusher
description: While in Combat, you have ADV on Stealth checks. Furthermore, if you are hidden from a creature, that creature has DIS on its Save against your Debilitating Strike.

name: Sinister Shot
description: Your *Cheap Shot* deals +1 damage for each additional Condition on the target. If a Condition has levels (X), each level of the Condition counts as an additional Condition. \\nIf a Condition states thats that you are also considered to have other conditions (Ex: When *Restrained* you are also considered to be *Hindered*), you do not gain additional damage for the **considered to have** Condition it lists.

name: Dashing Dodge
description: When you take the Dodge action you can move up to half of your Speed.

name: Taunting Shot
description: When you have ADV on an Attack, if you hit the target creature, you can spend 1 SP to force the target to make a Charisma Save against your Save DC. On a failure, the target creature is *Taunted* by you until the end of your next turn.

name: Tall Tales
description: You know how to play to a crowd. You can spend up to 5 minutes telling a story to a crowd of creatures (that are not immediately hostile to you) and keep their rapt attention the entire time. During this story, creatures within the crowd have DIS on Perception Checks.
